> Scryed nods to Talos, "I, uhh, my name is Scryed. Looks like I was
> in stasis for a lot longer that expected... things have changed. Now
> that I'm hear, I'd like to help you and your team out." She bows
> formally, and rises to wait for Talos' reply. She eyes Talos,
> getting a sense of the bot who seemed to be the leader of this
> Maximal team. He gave one a sense of confidence just looking at him,
> and perhaps, she thought, the inspiration to succeed.
>
>

{Talos}

    Talos leaned back in the cheer looking over the bot then nodded, "So far
we seem to be gaining the upper hand over Megatron, several predicons
apparently have been captured and I believe one has switched sides, this
provides us an enormous tactical advantage. I welcome you to the crew, find
yourselves some quarters and get some rest or visit the mess hall and raid
our supplies you must be hungry or tired. When you feel up for it report for
duty assignments. Dismissed."

    Talos turned to the comm regarding Condors message, "Well bring the bot
in and I'll talk to him or her. Talos out."
